components.name: Bi-Weekly Group Calls
components.description: Small-group accountability sessions with 5 other creators

components.name: Monthly Public Live Streams
components.description: Share your progress with the Ecamm community

components.name: Quarterly Focus Themes
components.description: Each quarter tackles a new area of growth

components.name: Access to Expert Partners
components.description: Learn from powerhouse creators in the Ecamm Fam

components.name: Case Study Creation
components.description: Hit your content goals and create a killer case study

commitment: Focused on growing brand, business, or audience through video
marketing_agreement: Share results publicly as part of case studies
Allow Ecamm to use content/story for marketing purposes
Provide testimonials and feedback about the program

application_process.selection_criteria: Competitive - looking for commitment, creativity, genuine desire to improve

must_include: Brief introduction to who you are and your brand
Highlights/clips from content you've already created
What accountability support would help you most

ecamm_testimonial.topic: Why you love Ecamm and being part of the Ecamm Fam

content_examples.description: Recent content that best represents your current work

faqs.question: Who can apply?
faqs.answer: Any current Ecamm Live subscriber who's actively creating content and ready to stay accountable in 2026.

faqs.question: Is this program free?
faqs.answer: Yes! Content Compass is 100% free for Ecamm subscribers.

faqs.question: How much time will this take?
faqs.answer: Expect to commit 5–10 hours a month. That includes calls, creating content, and applying group feedback.

faqs.question: What happens if I miss a call?
faqs.answer: We know life happens. If you can't make a call, you can be excused—but regular attendance is expected.

faqs.question: Will my participation be public?
faqs.answer: Yes! We'll highlight participants in streams, social media, and case studies. You'll be part of our creator spotlight content.

faqs.question: What if I'm not selected?
faqs.answer: Don't worry, you'll still be part of the Ecamm community. You'll get updates, invitations to public live streams, and future program opportunities.

faqs.question: When do we start?
faqs.answer: Early January 2026 until early December 2026 when we host an amazing celebration call after all that we've done together!

value_proposition.problem_statement: Stuck between knowing what to do and actually doing it
value_proposition.core_message: No one should have to do this stuff alone. We need support. We need each other and that's what makes us fam.
value_proposition.solution: Year-long accountability program with small group of fellow creators
outcomes: Create a case study of your journey

transcript_quotes.caleb_on_purpose: What we really wanted to do was include community members that are super focused, driven, ready to put in the work and the time and ready to create some awesome content together as we kind of journey together.
transcript_quotes.caleb_on_community: No one should have to do this stuff alone. We need support. We need each other and that's what makes us fam.
transcript_quotes.caleb_on_format: Every other week, me, Jill, and six of you will be in a Zoom call talking about what we're working on, how we can help each other and hold each other accountable to create the best content that we can create in 2026.
transcript_quotes.jill_on_journey: We're going to be taking this fun journey where we're going to be building strong creator habits. We're going to learn how to really own our voices. We're going to create a strong case study. We're going to prepare for our solo expedition.
transcript_quotes.caleb_personal_goal: I started my solo content journey last year, and I'm just looking to ramp things up and stay accountable to posting videos every week, if not twice a week.

david_application.name: David Cruwys
david_application.content_type_other: AI Agents & Context Engineering for Content Creators
